author: trawick
msg: Get "make install" to work on Tru64.

The work-around is to explicitly ignore the exit status from the

author: rbb
msg: Remove the change from earlier tonight to not send a content-length of

author: rbb
msg: Stop the default_handler from trying to deal with HEAD requests.  By doing
this, the content-length filter can determine the C-L before we send the
response, and we get a better response.
